      • checkStartActivity

        public boolean checkStartActivity(android.content.Intent intent,
                                  android.content.pm.ApplicationInfo callerApp,
                                  int callerUid,
                                  int callerPid,
                                  java.lang.String resolvedType,
                                  android.content.pm.ActivityInfo resolvedActivity)
        This is called from ActivityManager to check if a start activity intent should be allowed. It is assumed the caller is already holding the global ActivityManagerService lock.
